But there is another which is founded deeper.
But we identify a second whose foundation is deeper.
But there is a second and its foundation is deeper than the first.
Estel we call it, that is 'trust.'
We call it Estel, that is 'trust.'
We name it Estel, this word is 'trust.'
It is not defeated by the ways of the world, for it does not come from experience, but from our nature and first being.
It is not defeated by the paths of this world, for it is not from experience but from our identity and first essence.
The ways of the world do not overwhelm it, because it is not the result of experience but it is from our nature and first being.
If we are indeed the Eruhín, the Children of the One, then He will not suffer Himself to be deprived of His own, not by any Enemy, not even by ourselves.
If we ourselves are indeed Eruhín, the Children of the One, He will not suffer deprivation of his own by any enemy, not even by ourselves.
If we are indeed Eruhín, the Children of the One, then He will not permit that we who are his should be taken from him; He will not permit any enemy; He will not even permit us.

of all His designs the issue must be for His Children's joy.
of His plans, the intention must be for His Children's joy.
